00047 #define CH_THROW_LOGIC_EX(descr) (throw ChLogicException(__FILE__, __LINE__, descr))
00048 #define CH_LOGIC_ASSERT(cond, descr) if (!(cond)) CH_THROW_LOGIC_EX(descr);
00049 
00050 #define CH_THROW_PARSER_EX(descr) (throw ChParserException(__FILE__, __LINE__, descr))
00051 #define CH_PARSER_ASSERT(cond, descr) if (!(cond)) CH_THROW_PARSER_EX(descr);
00052
